paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naajjhattiko ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naajjhattiko

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha. Ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
